Description: Al-Ahlia Insurance Co (known as: Al-Ahlia) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since October 2007. Al-Ahlia operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has company operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Property and Casualty Insurance. Al-Ahlia is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in July 2007.
